content:
FHIR Implementation Guide Publisher (1.9.0-11378) is producing the following error...

   Connect to Terminology Server at http://fhir3.healthintersections.com.au/open    (17.0906sec)
   Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.validation.InstanceValidator.setNoBindingMsgSuppressed(Z)V
@Josh Mandel @Grahame Grieve The ig-build is unhappy. doesn't like Jekyll anymore. Can you take a look when you get time.
Hmm, that's interesting! Hoping I will have time to investigate tomorrow.
